## How can be tested?
1. `git checkout <branch>`
2. Run it locally: `npm run dev` or `docker-compose up`
3. Test scenarios:
   - [ ] Registration endpoint: POST /auth/signup
   - [ ] Drop list: GET /drops
   - [ ] Join the waitlist: POST /drops/:id/join
